titleStmt.title: A Famous conference between Pope Clement the Xth and Cardinal de Monte Alto concerning the late discovery of the Masse in Holy Scripture made by the worthy Father Patrick, an excellent engineer of the Church of Rome in England
titleStmt.author: Clement X, Pope, 1590-1676.
